title: Six Months of War In Ukraine
itunes:title: Six Months of War In Ukraine
description:
Neil Melvin, Director of International Security Studies at RUSI says the UK has taken a leadership role in the international response to the Russian invasion of Ukraine. He tells Bloomberg's Stephen Carroll and Yuan Potts that the conflict has sparked a revival of NATO. Plus: Bloomberg's Lizzy Burden and Marc Champion on the political and economic consequences of the war.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
